title: Virtual Executive Assistant & Business Growth Consultant
job_overview:
Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM – 5:00 PM EST (with a 1-hour lunch break)
Position Overview:
We are seeking a proactive, tech-savvy, and detail-oriented Virtual Executive Assistant to support consultants and business owners in streamlining their operations and driving business growth. This role requires someone who is resourceful, a strong communicator, and comfortable managing a wide variety of administrative, marketing, and support tasks.
Core Responsibilities:
Administrative Support
• Manage calendars, schedule appointments, and coordinate meetings
• Handle inbound and outbound calls using Grasshopper or a similar VOIP system
• Monitor and respond to emails and chats during work hours
• Maintain professional communication across Slack, CRM, and internal tools
Marketing & Outreach
• Assist in writing, formatting, and sending outbound marketing emails
• Support in setting up and managing marketing automations or follow-up sequences
• Make follow-up calls to leads and clients
• Track engagement and report results of campaigns
Content Creation & Publishing
• Design simple marketing assets (e.g., social media graphics, flyers) using Canva
• Draft, format, and schedule blog posts and content across platforms
• Create and schedule social media posts using Canva
Client & CRM Support
• Enter and update client information in CRM systems, including ISN and  Upgrade to see actual info
• Manage content and workflows inside Upgrade to see actual info (e.g., funnels, email automation, contact lists)
• Create blog posts using Upgrade to see actual info blog builder
• Use Canva for visual assets embedded in blog posts or email campaigns
• Monitor project pipelines and notify team of pending tasks or follow-ups
• Book consultation or coaching calls through calendar integrations (e.g., Full Slate)
• Growth & Strategy Assistance
• Research tools, competitors, or opportunities as assigned
• Attend team calls and note action items
• Provide feedback and suggestions to improve systems and workflow
Requirements:
• Excellent written and spoken English
• Reliable internet and working headset
• Experience using Slack, Canva, and CRM tools (or willingness to learn quickly)
• Strong organizational and communication skills
• Able to work independently and take initiative
• Willing to grow in the role and learn new tools/systems

Preferred (But Not Required):
• Experience using Grasshopper, ISN, or similar business systems
• Familiarity with marketing funnels or email automation
• Background in admin, real estate, or service-based businesses
        Familiarity with Upgrade to see actual info is a plus
What Success Looks Like:
• Prompt communication and responsiveness during all working hours
• Clear understanding and execution of tasks without needing constant supervision
• Active participation in helping the business grow — not just doing tasks, but thinking strategically
